item.title: Oscars: Lynette Howell Taylor Elected President of Film Academy

item.title: Prize Fight: Inside an Oscar Family Feud
item.description: When ‘In the Heat of the Night’ star Rod Steiger died, he left behind a glittering array of major awards. Now his daughter is fighting her step-sister in a bitter battle to reclaim them.
